duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate new leads through networking, cold calling, and researching various directories and internet sites.
Interact face-to-face with customers to foster relationships, maintain satisfaction, and deliver effective sales presentations.
Understand complex customer requirements for preparation of customized quoting and assist with on-site troubleshooting of customers' concerns.
Work with and coordinate vendor resources to build relationships and support sales, increasing revenue and profitability through generation of new business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree, industry, and sales experience required.
